actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, to require that administrative hearings be held within the municipality, county, or State concerned.

summary.text: Directs that venue for Federal administrative hearings concerning a single local governmental unit, geographic area, or State shall be such unit, area, or State. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 504)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 5, United States Code, to require that administrative hearings be held within the municipality, county, or State concerned.
